scripts.dev: lerna run dev --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
scripts.dist: lerna run dist --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
